ProjectTitle: Implementation of a multimodal screening program for interstitial lung disease in rheumatoid arthritis patients
InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/07/2022
For data preservation and sharing you could also consider using a repository such as KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr), where you can restrict access if you can't fully anonymize the data, in this way others can easily find your data thanks to the metadata and DIO assigned by the repository, but to get access to the files they have to submit a request and you can give access after they sign a data transfer agreement
label: good with suggestions
